mapper.select: SELECT notice_id as noticeId, notice_title as noticeTitle, created_date as createdDate FROM tb_notice ORDER BY created_date desc FETCH FIRST 3 ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(A.PRODUCT_ID) AS "POPULAR", B.PRODUCT_NAME FROM TB_PRODUCT_BUY A LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT B ON A.PRODUCT_ID = B.PRODUCT_ID WHERE TRUNC(A.CREATED_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY A.PRODUCT_ID, B.PRODUCT_NAME ORDER BY "POPULAR" DESC FETCH FIRST 4 ROWS ONLY
